translation: When it comes to salary increase, I think it should be done this way. After all, the company has been giving salary raises every year for so many years, but now it seems that labor costs are indeed a bit high. I think we can consider this approach: some units give raises based on years of service, which results in very small increments. For those who do not make any significant contributions, they can receive a raise of 100 yuan for every year of service. This compromise can prevent instability and reduce turnover after the new year.

第二个，就是客户那边人手的问题，我们案件线索可以不断提供，他们那边人手不够，搞不过来，一个案子可能就很长
translation:
The first one is the statistics of the amount involved in the case, which we do not know. Criminal cases are fine to deal with, after all, there are judgments. For administrative cases, the fines are directly imposed. If the client does not tell us the truth, we also do not know. We are more likely to suffer losses and be passive.
The second issue is the lack of manpower on the client's side. We can continuously provide case clues, but they do not have enough manpower to handle it. A case might take a long time.

message: 据说无锡那个会战，奇安信免费去干一个月，不要项目不要钱。也是拼了

[ThumbsUp][OMG]

message: 又是一个月过去了，还是没回款
translation: Another month has passed, still no payment received.
What's going on in Shaanxi?

message: 有我们的问题也有客户的问题，一开始5月份各家进场进行产品测试，就是发现我们这边有很多售前留下来的坑，就是研发没法满足，然后就协调解决了很多，临时改或者以一些折中的办法替换产品。客户那边安排的是几个技术对接每家公司，技术就按照招标参数来对和测试，我们现在这边产品解决的还剩两个问题，一个是安洵云的一些功能问题，客户提出来的说是常规功能，譬如一些导出的，我们没有，但和研发沟通下来这个功能肯定短期做不出来，还有个就是twitter 落地的，本来就是买的账号，鼓捣让我们将数据要部署在本地，那个产品又属于第三方产品，我后面协调从第三方那边搞了几万条过来放本地交差，但查询还是在远程，客户又说不行，这样会被科信发现，但改用本地查询，我们要开发个系统，时间来不及。现在客户那边主要怕科信那边验收出现问题，怕以后被盯上，所以一直说我们自己内部检查严格些，有问题解决问题，这都没事，但到科信那边的话，被发现问题就麻烦了，说现在又是教育整顿期间。
translation: Both we and our customers have encountered problems. Starting from May, each company entered the scene to conduct product testing, and it was discovered that there were many pre-sales pitfalls left behind our end. This is because the R&D team could not meet the requirements. We coordinated and solved many issues, either by making temporary changes or by replacing products with some compromises. The customers arranged for several technical interfaces for each company. The technical aspects are based on the bidding parameters and testing. Currently, we have two remaining issues with our products. One is some functional issues with the Anxun Cloud, which the customer pointed out as common functions, such as exports that we do not have. However, after communicating with the R&D team, it was clear that this function could not be developed in the short term. The other issue is regarding the landing of Twitter data. Originally, the accounts were purchased, and the customer requested our data to be deployed locally. Since this product belongs to a third party, I coordinated with the third party to bring in thousands of data entries for local use as part of the compromise. However, the querying still needs to be done remotely. The customer insisted that this is not acceptable as it might be discovered by a third party audit. However, switching to local querying would require us to develop a new system, which we do not have time for. Currently, the customer is mainly concerned that any issues discovered during the third party audit will cause trouble in the future, so they keep emphasizing the need for strict internal checks and problem resolution. This is fine within our own company, but if issues are discovered by the third party, it will be troublesome. They mentioned that it is currently a period of educational rectification.

message: 具体的解决办法，我今天从晋城就去陕西，带上研发的，晚上和陕西那边当面对下这两个问题，看客户做到什么程度可以验收，我们研发这边能做到什么程度，双方各自看退让下，我也叫上他们副总。当面协商
translation: Specific solution, I will go from Jincheng to Shaanxi today, bringing the research and development team. In the evening, we will meet face to face in Shaanxi to address these two issues, to see to what extent the customer can accept, to see to what extent our research and development team can achieve. Both sides will make concessions, I will also bring their deputy general manager to negotiate face to face.
Facepalm

message: 上周五约了他们，今天下午我就从晋城过去，当面将解决方案定下来，研发也在，他们提的能做到的，时间短的我们就做，不能做到的就说不行，就看商量咋解决
translation: I made an appointment with them last Friday, and this afternoon I will go from Jincheng to finalize the solution face to face. The R&D team is also present. We will do what they suggest and can be done in a short time. If it cannot be done, we will say it's not possible and discuss how to solve it.

message: 晋城这边项目应该基本没啥问题了，昨天已经和他们支队长一起对下交付产品的形态，是试用还是正式版交付，只要中间不出啥幺蛾子，应该可以了
translation: The project in Jincheng should be basically fine, as the shape of the delivered product, whether it is a trial version or a formal version, has been discussed with their team leader. As long as nothing unexpected happens in the process, it should be fine.
Hmm

message: 昨天最后给他们加强信心，我说可以给他们送个菠菜线索，也给他们展示了

message: 哪些人负责的，全部开掉

message: 负责的售前都离职了都。有我们历史的运营的问题，之前都是为了拿项目，售前这块方案都没审，现在要改研发人手又不够。客户这边又因为教育整顿，明明之前都是云上查询的，现在要搞本地，说上海和江苏那边出了事情，被安全抓走了，将数据卖给境外了，所以现在要数据在本地。
translation: The responsible pre-sales have all left. There are operational issues with our history. Previously, in order to win projects, the pre-sales proposals were not reviewed. Now we need to make changes but there are not enough R&D personnel. On the client side, due to an educational rectification, although previously everything was on the cloud for inquiries, now they want it local. They said there were incidents in Shanghai and Jiangsu where data was taken by security and sold abroad, so now they want the data to be local.
It took three months to say this?
What did you do before?

message: 准备验收材料，就搞了很久，然后搞测试。数据放本地这个也是上周才说的，那个事故也是才说的
translation: Preparation of acceptance materials took a long time, and then testing was conducted. It was only last week that they mentioned storing the data locally, and the same goes for the accident mentioned recently.
Who is responsible for it must be taken down.
These three months were wasted.

message: 你5月初跟我说马上就好，现在6月初了这个月估计都好不了
translation: You told me in early May that everything would be fine soon, but now it's early June and I guess it won't get better this month.

message: 今天说的，让我们这个月改好，月底验收，现在就等我们。说8月份要教育整顿他们，不能等到那个时候，在这事情要搞完
translation: What we discussed today is to make improvements this month and undergo evaluation by the end of the month. We are now waiting for that. It was mentioned that they need to have rectification in August, we cannot wait until then, this matter needs to be resolved.

message: 咋白搭了？现在材料准备好了，其他家都测试完了，等我们这个改完就验收，毕竟800多万，主要也赶上这个教育整顿，都怕出事，所以他们那边过的就比较严，科信那边肯定就这么严了
translation: What's the holdup? The materials are ready now, other companies have already completed the testing. As soon as we finish our modifications, the inspection will be conducted. After all, it's over 8 million, especially with the ongoing education reform, everyone is afraid of making mistakes. That's why they are more strict over there, and it's certain that Ke Xin will be just as strict.

message: 你看看你上个月怎么说的
translation: You can see what you said last month.
Let's see what April has to say.

message: 是差不多，都是准备材料 改材料，准备测试产品，解决问题，但你可以问问华东，之前提了多少问题要改，研发改也要时间，人手又不够，只能等改好再去现场测
translation: It's almost the same, all preparing materials, changing materials, preparing test products, solving problems, but you can ask East China how many problems were mentioned before that need to be changed. Research and development also takes time, manpower is not enough, can only wait for the changes to be completed before testing on site.

message: 现在就剩2个问题要改，今天研发的也在，其他的都改完了，这个月问题肯定都改完。今天都一个问题一个问题都过完了。
translation: There are only 2 questions left to be revised now, the ones developed today are also done, all the rest have been revised, for sure all issues will be resolved by the end of this month. Today, we have gone through each and every question separately.

translation: The work of the administrative department should be fine, Zhou Qiao should take care of it and there should be no problems. Hou Min is mainly responsible for confidential matters, you and Hua Dong can directly manage, and Zhou Qiao can gradually provide assistance.

message: 其实刘桢宇应该确实想好了，她是等到周巧回来再提的

message: 行政部经理就是周巧具体干活好像，执行可以做的很好，统筹估计不行了
translation: The administrative department manager, Zhou Qiao, seems to do specific work well, but may not be good at overall coordination.

message: 不是。其实聊了挺久。其实她也不是一定要走。说了几个问题吧。
translation: No. Actually, we talked for quite a while. Actually, she doesn't necessarily have to leave. We discussed a few issues.
What does this mean?
Scowl

message:
1、觉得公司对职能部门和技术部门差距太大，倒不是她自己吧，就是觉得技术岗在薪资和年终奖上体现差距还可以接受，在福利上都有差距，让职能部门的人觉得职能部门没啥贡献。这个李正侠倒也提过，就是有职能部门甚至说让公司将职能部门都开除了好 了。
2、感觉公司最近的一些做法，有点让人觉得不公平。觉得会哭的会哭的孩子才有奶喝。觉得要去吵，去闹，去哭，然后就可以升职加薪。大概指的就是赵珩羽和秦晓希的事情。
3、就是个人发展问题，确实行政部门发展确实也受限，也想为公司多做点事情，她也提出了目前公司存在的一些问题，也和我说了。我和她说的是建议她，可以将精力做部分转移。就是行政工作现在其实已经常态化，她可以放手给周巧做执行，她也提出可以让候敏带着指导，我是建议她短期可以将精力花在一些项目申报和津贴这些上面，这些是我们之前忽略的部分，最近她和候敏还是帮助公司申请了几十万的补贴。和政府的政策 津贴这些。她大概也能接受。意思是想多学点，多承担点，不然这个年纪有点尴尬。
translation:
1. She feels that there is a significant gap between the functional departments and the technical departments in the company. It's not just her, she just feels that the difference in salary and year-end bonuses for technical positions is acceptable, but there are differences in benefits that make the people in the functional departments feel like they are not contributing much. Li Zhengxia has mentioned this before, even suggesting that the company should just dismiss the functional departments altogether.

2. She feels that some recent actions of the company are a bit unfair. She feels like only the child who cries gets milk. She feels like you have to make noise, create a fuss, cry, and then you can get promoted and receive a raise. This probably refers to the situation of Zhao Hengyu and Qin Xiaoxi.

3. It's a personal development issue. The development of the administrative department is indeed limited, and she also wants to do more for the company. She has pointed out some problems that currently exist in the company, and she has also discussed them with me. I advised her to consider shifting some of her focus. The administrative work has become routine, she can delegate the execution to Zhou Qiao and have Hong Min provide guidance. I suggested that in the short term, she could focus her energy on project applications and subsidies, which we have overlooked before. Recently, she and Hong Min helped the company apply for hundreds of thousands in subsidies from the government. She seems to be accepting of this. The idea is to learn more and take on more responsibilities; otherwise, it's a bit awkward at this age.

message: 我也和她聊了，她说大概端午后和你聊聊。我是觉得还是可以留下来。就是觉得有些公平，作为老员工，有点心寒。然后自己发展也是个问题。对公司还是比较有感情。
translation: I also talked to her, and she said she will probably chat with you after the Dragon Boat Festival. I think it's still possible to stay. It's just that I feel a little cold-hearted as a senior employee. And personal development is also a problem. I still have feelings for the company.

message: 还有就是觉得技术部团建的问题，觉得市场部去也就算了，团建不是应该行政安排的么，市场部去了，还高调的发朋友圈，在公司内部很多人看了，觉得不公平，造成影响不好。还有个小道消息就是说赵珩羽加薪了，还在和人炫耀。
translation: Another issue is that I feel the team building activities organized by the technical department are fine, but it should be arranged by the administration. It doesn't seem right for the marketing department to attend. Moreover, they even boast about it on social media, causing some people within the company to see it and think it's unfair, creating a negative impact. We are writing to notify you that your application will be removed from the China App Store because it includes content that is illegal in China as determined by the CAC (Cyberspace Administration of China), which is not in compliance with the App Store Review Guidelines :

5. Legal
Apps must comply with all legal requirements in any location where you make them available (if you’re not sure, check with a lawyer). It is your responsibility to understand and make sure your app conforms with all local laws, not just the guidelines below. And of course, apps that solicit, promote, or encourage criminal or clearly reckless behavior will be rejected.

While your app has been removed from the China App Store, it is still available in the App Stores for the other territories you selected in App Store Connect. For more information regarding the laws and requirements in China, we encourage you to reach out to the CAC (Cyberspace Administration of China) directly:

Best regards,

message: 目前在推的，2个地市，一个是丹徒，这个他们案子立起来了，还没动手。丹徒一把手局长刚换了，不过对我们还比较有利，一把手是之前市局的网安支队长下去的，市局让我近期去下，介绍认识下，那边意思是可以深度推下。第二个是润州区，这个地方，现在具体办案是治安，给的第一个线索，他们说查账，对不上，给了几个账号，都对不上金额，他们就有点虚，猜测那个平台在做假账，所以最近又换了个，他们还在查···他们市局副支队长还是比较积极，想做点事。也在帮我们推荐地市，现在说其他区县有的局长可能也要动，让等定下来再去谈
translation:
Currently, there are two cities being promoted. One is Dantu, where the case has been established but action has not yet been taken. The head of Dantu has just been changed, but it is still advantageous for us, as the new head used to be the director of the network security brigade of the city bureau. The city bureau has asked me to visit and get to know him recently, implying that they want to deepen their cooperation.

The second city is Runzhou District, where currently the specific case involves public security. They received the first clue, but after checking the accounts, they found discrepancies in several account numbers. They suspect that the platform is falsifying accounts, so they have recently made a change and are still investigating. The deputy director of the city bureau there is still quite proactive and wants to make progress. They are also helping to recommend cities for us. They are currently saying that some district heads in other counties may also be about to change, so they want to wait until things are settled before discussing further.

message: 景德镇的问题，我让周伟伟去沟通了，客户反馈的不满意的地方说了3点：1、之前项目交付，说有台外星人的电脑，交付没多久主板就坏了，李鹏程这边只是给了厂家的联系信息，就没管了，客户有点不爽。  2、就是服务支撑的问题，当时项目里要送个案件线索，客户意思是从中标到现在，要了几次，一直也没给，确实后台也没有。3、就是那个电信诈骗的案例，客户周四给的线索，我看周五提交的钉钉，然后今天和客户说客户提供的账号密码登陆不了，客户觉得我们不积极，然后就有点不爽，意思是后面验收是不是他们是不是也可以不积极。然后我也问了下项目的情况，整个项目 138W，有个外采的安卓🐎 ，20多W，剩下的都是我们的，当时交付的是我们的产品，产品用于满足验收就行，剩下的就是提供 QB 和案件线索啥的。
translation: The issues in Jingdezhen, I asked Zhou Weiwei to communicate. The client feedback three points of dissatisfaction: 1. The previous project delivery, they said there was a computer problem with the Taiwan Star, and shortly after delivery, the motherboard broke. Li Pengcheng only provided the manufacturer's contact information and didn't follow up, which made the client a little unhappy. 2. The issue of service support, the client requested some case clues in the project, indicating that they had asked for it several times from the bid until now, but it was never provided, and there was indeed nothing in the backend. 3. The case of telecom fraud, the client provided the clue on Thursday, and I saw it submitted on DingTalk on Friday. Then today when I told the client that they couldn't log in with the account and password provided, the client felt we were not proactive, and so they were a little unhappy. They wondered if they could also not be proactive during the final acceptance. I also asked about the project situation, the entire project is 1.38 million, with an external Android <Horse>, around 200,000, the rest are ours. At the time of delivery, it was our product used to meet the acceptance criteria, the rest is to provide QB and case clues.

上面3个项目，现在基本都是两天盯一次进度的，扬州那个政策感觉是政府没钱了，才突然搞了个这个政策
translation:
1. The project in Yangzhou has applied for acceptance and has been sent to the audit department. The audit department said that according to the new policy this year, projects need to undergo a trial operation of at least six months before going through the acceptance process. The client had not mentioned this situation before.
2. Due to the sudden outbreak of the epidemic in Jincheng, everyone is busy with investigations. In addition, after their director was arrested, the new deputy director who was supposed to be appointed before has left, and the other new deputy director has not arrived yet.
3. The main issues in Jingdezhen are twofold. First, there are 7 official computers from the alien company, with 5 of them being faulty. The client requests a replacement, but the company only offers repairs. The client is dissatisfied with this result. Second, the gambling website provided earlier had a small amount of bank records discovered during the investigation. They wish to establish another type of website. I have asked Zhou Weiwei to take over the acceptance of this project. 
The progress of these three projects is now being monitored every two days. The policy in Yangzhou feels like the government is short on funds, which is why they suddenly introduced this policy.

2. Array Networks APV
Name: Array Networks APV front-end unconditional RCE
Description: Array Networks is a company dedicated to improving the availability, response speed, security, and accessibility of resources and applications, helping mobile users increase productivity. The APV application delivery controller is its core product, ranking among the top 10 application delivery controllers globally. It is used by six of the world's top ten banks, eight of the top ten telecommunications companies, and four of the top ten technology companies. Over 20% of the Global 2000 companies use it. message:
渗透测试三组——魁杓攻防研究实验室，
       魁杓，指北斗七星，出自《淮南子·天文训》：“斗杓为小岁。”高诱注：“斗第一星至第四为魁，第五至第七为杓。”七星代表目前团队7名成员，也代表着地球上七大洲，七星承载着个人和团队梦想，以工匠精神为指引，以强国伟业为目标，希望某天可以成为国内甚至国际上顶尖的攻防技术团队。
translation: Penetration testing team Three - Kui Biao Attack and Defense Research Laboratory, Kui Biao, refers to the Big Dipper, from the "Huainanzi · Astronomy Training": "The Dipper is for small years." Gao You annotation: "From the first star to the fourth in the Dipper are Kui, from the fifth to the seventh are Biao." The seven stars represent the current team of 7 members, as well as the seven continents on earth. The seven stars carry the dreams of individuals and teams, guided by the spirit of craftsmanship, with the goal of a strong national achievement. We hope that one day we can become a top attack and defense technology team in China and even internationally.

message: 恭喜嵩哥，三个老板们一致盛赞，恭喜魁杓落成

message:
渗透测试三组——魁杓攻防研究实验室，
       魁杓，指北斗七星，出自《淮南子·天文训》：“斗杓为小岁。”高诱注：“斗第一星至第四为魁，第五至第七为杓。”七星代表团队7名渗透成员，也代表着地球上七大洲，七星承载着个人和团队梦想，以工匠精神为指引，以强国伟业为目标，希望某天可以成为国内甚至国际上顶尖的攻防技术团队。
translation:
Penetration testing group three - the Kuiba Attack and Defense Research Laboratory.
Kuiba refers to the Big Dipper, which comes from the "Huainanzi · Astronomy Lesson": "The Dipper is called the small year." Gao You noted: "The first to fourth stars of the Big Dipper are Kuiba, and the fifth to seventh stars are Shao." The seven stars represent the 7 penetration members of the team, as well as the seven continents on Earth. The seven stars carry individual and team dreams, guided by the spirit of craftsmen and aiming for the great achievements of a strong country. Hopefully, one day they can become one of the top attack and defense technology teams domestically and internationally.

message:
渗透测试二组——行式实验室
 行式（xing二声 shi二声)，原指故宫太和殿屋脊上的排行第十的压尾神兽，是一只长着翅膀的猴面人身神猴，有剪除邪恶、主持公道之意，更有传承和守护之象征。四川方言也有行式（hang 二声shi三声)一说，有厉害、内行、好把式之意。作为最早的渗透测试团队之一，一直以高标准严要求进行团队管理，以传承和发扬团队早期带领人钻研进取、探索创新的精神为指引，希望通过不断的成长和发展，某天可以成为公司的行式以及整个网络安全行业的行式。
translation:
Penetration Testing Group 2 - Walking Experiment Lab
Walking (xing second tone shi second tone), originally referred to as the tenth-ranked trailing mythical creature on the roof of the Taihe Palace in the Forbidden City, is a mythical monkey-faced monkey with wings. It symbolizes the removal of evil, the maintenance of justice, and the inheritance and protection. There is also a saying in Sichuan dialect, walking (hang second tone shi third tone), meaning tough, knowledgeable, and skilled. As one of the earliest penetration testing teams, we have always been managing the team with high standards and strict requirements, guided by the spirit of inheritance and promotion of the early team leader's spirit of exploration and innovation. We hope that through continuous growth and development, one day we can become the model of the company and the entire network security industry.
Review below

message:
渗透测试二组——行式实验室
 行什（xing二声 shi二声)，原指故宫太和殿屋脊上排行第十的压尾神兽，是一只长着翅膀的猴面人身神猴，有剪除邪恶、主持公道之意，更有传承和守护之象征。四川方言也有行什（hang 二声shi三声)一说，有厉害、内行、好把式之意。作为最早的渗透测试团队之一，一直以高标准严要求进行团队管理，以传承和发扬团队早期带领人钻研进取、探索创新的精神为指引，希望通过不断的成长和发展，可以成为公司的行什以及整个网络安全行业的行什。

渗透测试三组—魁杓实验室
   魁杓，指北斗七星，出自《淮南子·天文训》：“斗杓为小岁。”高诱注：“斗第一星至第四为魁，第五至第七为杓。”七星代表团队7名渗透成员，也代表着地球上七大洲，七星承载着个人和团队梦想，以工匠精神为指引，以强国伟业为目标，希望某天可以成为国内甚至国际上顶尖的攻防技术团队。
translation:
Penetration Testing Group Two - Line Experiment Laboratory
Line Shi (the second tone xing, the second tone shi) originally referred to the tenth mythical beast on the ridge of the Ta He Hall in the Forbidden City, which is a monkey-faced deity with wings, symbolizing the removal of evil, upholding justice, as well as inheritance and protection. There is also a saying in Sichuan dialect, Line Shi (the second tone hang, the third tone shi), meaning powerful, knowledgeable, and skilled. As one of the earliest penetration testing teams, we have always managed the team with high standards and strict requirements, guided by the spirit of inheritance and promotion of the early team leader's spirit of exploration and innovation, hoping to become the Line Shi of the company and the entire cybersecurity industry through continuous growth and development.

Penetration Testing Group Three - Kui Shao Laboratory
Kui Shao refers to the Big Dipper, originating from "Huai Nan Zi · Tian Wen Xun": "The Dipper is small years." Gao You's note: "The first to fourth stars of the Big Dipper are Kui, and the fifth to seventh are Shao." The seven stars represent the seven penetration members of the team, as well as the seven continents on Earth. The seven stars carry individual and team dreams, guided by the spirit of craftsmanship and aiming for the great goal of building a strong nation. We hope to become one of the top attack and defense technology teams in China and even internationally one day.

message: 1、规定这样的报销制度的原因到底是如何：如是公司资金紧张而不发，那为什么还要组织团建，而且团建的地方又都是成都周边大家都去过，毫无意义（她清楚的知道团建地点）；如果是为了优化销售团队，那这样会打击到销售人员的积极性，很有可能有些人就会有想法，我就混到年底，到时间发报销了，我拿了报销就走（涉及到这么具体的想法）。
translation: The reason for establishing such a reimbursement system is: if the company is tight on funds and does not issue reimbursements, why organize team building activities? Moreover, the team building locations are all places near Chengdu that everyone has been to, which is meaningless. (She is clearly aware of the team building locations); if it is to optimize the sales team, this will have a negative impact on the motivation of sales personnel, and some people may have the idea of just getting by until the end of the year, and when it's time for reimbursement, I will take the reimbursement and leave (involving such specific ideas).

message: 2、奇安信之前说要入股，因为20年没法年终奖导致人心涣散，最终很多核心人员被奇安信挖走，然后他们就不入股了，变成收购老股
translation: Qihoo 360 previously said they wanted to invest because they couldn't offer year-end bonuses for 20 years, which caused a loss of morale. Ultimately, many key personnel were poached by Qihoo 360, and then they decided not to invest and instead became the acquirer of old shares.

message: 3、客户反馈因为我们核心人员流失，现在都不敢把项目交给我们，说南京之前有个上千万的项目就是这个原因，另外现在销售人员现在都不敢承接项目，怕公司没有能力实施
translation: Customer feedback: Due to the turnover of our core personnel, they are now afraid to entrust projects to us. They mentioned that a project worth millions in Nanjing before was the reason for this. In addition, sales personnel are now also afraid to take on projects, fearing that the company does not have the capability to implement them.

message: 嗯，伟哥之前提到过大客户的业绩也会算提成给到我们售前。
translation: Well, Wei mentioned before that performance from major clients will also be included in the commissions for us in pre-sales.
So it should be fine.

message: 其实销售一年也没提成多少，像小娟，去年一分钱没有，还扣了几千块工资
translation: Actually, the commission for sales is not much in a year, like Xiao Juan, she didn't get any money last year, and even had a few thousand yuan deducted from her salary.

message: 嗯，我知道，销售也有业绩压力，所以提成高或者收入高我可以接受，但是我只是觉得售前在公司真的在项目里面前中后期都在参与，给的提成确实太少了，按我的价值判断来说，当然我的判断可能有误。
translation: Yes, I understand that sales also face performance pressure, so I can accept a high commission or income. However, I just feel that the pre-sales staff in the company are really involved in the front, middle, and later stages of the project, and the commission given is really too little. Based on my value judgment, of course, my judgment may be wrong.

message: 嗯，所以现在不是要增加嘛
translation: Well, shouldn't we be increasing right now?

message: 大客户部的业绩还是可以的
translation: The performance of the key account department is still good.

message: 今年也算售前的话，应该还是可以的
translation: This year is also considered pre-sale, so it should be okay.

message: 大客户部主要也是你支持的
translation: The Key Account Department is mainly supported by you.

message:
嗯，按目前的政策，确实感觉未来可期。大家也都有奔头，有干劲。
我这边再结合我自己的情况考虑考虑吧，C总。
不好意思，让你费心了。
translation:
Well, according to the current policy, it does feel like the future is promising. Everyone has goals and motivation. 
I will consider my own situation and discuss it with you, C. 
I'm sorry for causing you trouble.

message: 我是不希望你走，留下来好好干，毕竟你现在也是主管了
translation: I do not want you to leave, stay and work well, after all, you are also in charge now.

message:
嗯，我知道，C总。
其实走的引子在19年底20年初就埋下来了。
19年我工资是税前10200，年终拿了2.5个月
20年我薪资是税前11700（含200保密费）

17年，我来安洵的时候工资是7500，在海康是8000，我降薪来的安洵，我觉得只要自己努力了，收入肯定是会上涨的。18年公司给我调了1000，涨到8500，19年初调了公司规定的20%，涨到10200。那个时候我觉得我的价值被公司看见了，也认可我。

但是19年我觉得我干得比18年还努力，结果年终和调薪都不及预期，然后我自己没有去抱怨或者去吐槽，我只是告诉自己用20年的表现去证明自己。

20年我升为了主管，不管是部门的团队或者人员的招聘，还有日常管理，还有各种项目，各种文档工作，我都觉得自己20年是来安洵最忙，最不知疲惫的一年，客户有需求，我可以做到第一时间反馈，客户有问题，我可以做到第一时间处理。

但是发现辛苦一年，还是啥都没有。可能自己就觉得很失望很失落，我不太喜欢去表达或者邀功来证明自己，我有时候骨子里面还是想说是因为能力OK，所以才可以匹配对应的收入，以及把我的激情或者热情可以持续投入到公司的事业当中。
translation:
Well, I know, Manager C.
Actually, the prelude to leaving was planted at the end of 2019 and the beginning of 2020.
In 2019, my salary was 10,200 before tax, and I received a bonus of 2.5 months at the end of the year.
In 2020, my salary was 11,700 before tax (including a 200 confidentiality fee).

In 2017, my salary at Anxun was 7,500, and at Hikvision it was 8,000. I took a pay cut to join Anxun, thinking that as long as I worked hard, my income would definitely rise. In 2018, the company raised my salary by 1,000 to 8,500. At the beginning of 2019, the company gave me a 20% raise, increasing my salary to 10,200. At that time, I felt that the company recognized my worth and approved of me.

However, in 2019, I felt that I worked even harder than in 2018, but the year-end results and salary increase were both below expectations. I didn't complain or vent, I just told myself to prove myself with my performance in 2020.

In 2020, I was promoted to supervisor. Whether it was team recruitment, daily management, various projects, or document work, I felt that 2020 was the busiest and most exhausting year for me at Anxun. If a customer had a need, I could provide feedback immediately; if a customer had a problem, I could handle it immediately.

But after a year of hard work, I found that I had nothing. Perhaps I was disappointed and felt lost. I don’t like to express myself or show off to prove myself. Sometimes deep down, I still think it's because of my abilities that I can match corresponding income, and that I can continue to invest my passion and enthusiasm in the company's business.

message: 不好意思，打了太多字，C总。
translation: Sorry, I typed too many words, C.

message: 嗯，可以理解，去年其实因为疫情，公司整体亏损大概400万左右，有些款都没回来，像拉萨和陕西的都没付。但是公司还是优先保障了技术线的同事，只是都少分点。整个后台部门和研发都是一分钱都没有
translation: Well, I understand. Actually, last year due to the epidemic, the company had a total loss of about 4 million, some payments were not received, such as those from Lhasa and Shaanxi. However, the company still prioritized the colleagues in the technical line, just with a slightly smaller share. Neither the entire backstage department nor the research and development team received any money.

message: 许倩一年到头和我出差应酬，去年年底年终奖也是没有的。
translation: Xu Qian accompanied me on business trips throughout the year, but she did not receive a year-end bonus at the end of last year.

message: 销售那边是因为有制度，完成了业绩提成也是合情合理。没完成的就没有。只是之前制度对售前提成比例少了点，今年就调整过来
translation: On the sales side, because there is a system, it is reasonable to receive performance bonuses. Those who do not achieve it will not receive it. It's just that the system had a slightly lower commission rate for pre-sales before, but it has been adjusted this year.

message: 所以公司还是整体偏向技术线的，看看研发一分钱都没有。他们也是忙了一年
translation: So the company is still mostly leaning towards the technical side, just look at how the R&D department has no funding. They have also been busy for a year.

message: 去年也有军工和上海周帅他们团队花了钱，也是一部分，所以去年底就都裁掉了
translation: Last year, the military industry and the team of Zhou Shuai in Shanghai also spent money, so they were also cut in the end of last year.

message: 制度不合理的，提出来可以修改
translation: The system is not reasonable, it can be modified if proposed.

message: 许倩来公司两年了，到现在一分钱工资都没加过
translation: Xu Qian has been with the company for two years, and so far not a single cent has been added to her salary.

message: 去年公司只有售前和技术线拿了奖金，而且比去年好
translation: Last year, only the sales and technical departments in the company received bonuses, and they were better than last year.

message:
嗯，其实我没有说对销售提成多有意见，只是我一个13年毕业，工作7年的人了，一年收入到手我觉得和我的付出不匹配。

我也认同技术线的工作，他们是公司获取项目的可靠力量，因为我们安洵不是商务型公司，都是靠技术赢得客户认可，所以才会有项目的，他们应该得到他们应有的。
translation:
Well, actually I don't have much of an opinion on the sales commission, it's just that I graduated in 2013 and have been working for 7 years. I feel that the income I receive every year does not match my efforts.

I also agree with the technical line of work, they are the reliable force for the company to obtain projects. Because we are not a business-oriented company, we rely on technology to win customer recognition, which is why we have projects. They should get what they deserve.

message: 技术线很多人去年年底说实话，拿的比你少
translation: Many people in the tech industry were honest at the end of last year, saying they earned less than you.

message: 组长好像也就一万多点
translation: The team leader seems to have just over 10,000 points.
Team members are 5000-8000.
Last year was just the epidemic.
Many projects have not received any funds.

message: 今年销售都考核毛利，压力更大
translation: This year, sales are being evaluated based on gross profit, resulting in increased pressure.

message:
C总，我可以理解。
但是我也希望公司可以体会到我的感受，19年底公司一派欣欣向荣的时候，我其实没有得到啥，得到的是调薪1300，年终2.5个月。当然这个是我自己觉得不满意的。

20年，因为疫情影响，但是我也有认认真真干好每一件事情，并没有把我19年的不满带到工作中。

20年10月4日是我结婚的日子，我9月30日还在和售前的兄弟们在上海三所列装，弄完了后赶了晚上的飞机回成都，落地回到家凌晨一点多，直接收拾东西然后载着我女朋友先去贵州那边丈母娘家接他们去我老家。我真的很热爱在安洵的工作，我很多时候也都把工作放在了我的第一位置。C总。

真的感谢C总你给我讲这么多，我这边周末这两天会进行综合考虑，做出最后决定。
translation:
Boss C, I can understand. But I also hope that the company can understand my feelings. At the end of 2019, when the company was thriving, I actually didn't get much. I only got a raise of 1300 yuan and a year-end bonus of 2.5 months. Of course, I am not satisfied with this.

In 2020, due to the impact of the epidemic, I have been diligently doing every task without bringing my dissatisfaction from 2019 to work.

October 4, 2020 is the day of my wedding. On September 30, I was still in Shanghai with my pre-sales brothers. After finishing our work, I rushed to catch the night flight back to Chengdu, landing home after midnight. I packed my things, then took my girlfriend to Guizhou to pick up her parents and bring them to my hometown. I really love working at Anxun, and I often prioritize work above everything else.

Thank you so much Boss C for sharing so much with me. I will take this weekend to consider everything comprehensively and make a final decision.
Hmm, I understand.

message: 你确实对工作还是很认真负责，客户对你评价都可以
translation: You are indeed very serious and responsible about your work, and the clients are all satisfied with your performance.

message: 好好干，今年应该不会像去年那样了
translation: Work hard, this year shouldn't be like last year.

message:
C总，你先忙你的。不用操心我这事了。[Facepalm]
我这边会做出权衡的，包括你提到的政策，包括今年的情况等等。
translation: Boss, you go ahead and do your stuff. Don't worry about me. [Facepalm] I will make considerations here, including the policies you mentioned, as well as the situation this year, and so on.
Hmm, it's nothing.

message: 主要你和许倩都是我用惯了，也比较让我放心
translation: Both you and Xu Qian are the ones I am used to and also the ones who make me feel reassured.
Thank you for your trust, Mr. C.

message: 嗯，好好干，所以要相信我，不会让你们白干的
translation: Well, work hard and believe in me, I won't let you down.

message: 我先去市局了，再坚持一年，缓一缓。
translation: I will go to the city bureau first, persist for another year, and take a break.

message:
不用了，C总，真的。
我会站好最后一班岗的，我没那么重要，不值得你和伟哥花这么多精力来挽留，而且其他售前兄弟真的有这个能力顶上来的。我对他们都有信心的。
translation:
No need, Mr. C, really. 
I will stay at the last post, I am not that important, it is not worth your and V's effort to retain, and other pre-sales brothers really have the ability to take over. I have confidence in them all.
Dizzy
Thank you, General C.
Thank you sincerely.
Young people, don't be impulsive.

message:
我没冲动，我是真的过不去自己心里的那道坎。
公司这边后续针对前期项目不清楚或者不了解的，我可以当个免费顾问，并且进行配合。

周末或者啥的过来配合看看标书或者啥的都可以的。真的。

我也希望安洵好，但是我现在的状态和我心里的这种情绪真的不适合在公司了。
translation:
I didn't act rashly, I really can't get past that barrier in my heart.
For follow-up projects that the company is unclear about or doesn't understand, I can act as a free consultant and cooperate.
Feel free to come over on weekends or whenever to look at the bidding documents or anything else. Really.
I also hope An Xun is well, but my current state and this kind of emotion in my heart really aren't suitable for the company.

message:
C总，11局去年列装三所和一所那边通过的主要为：
1. 匿名防溯墙
2. 网络流量反制系统
3. TT控制取证平台
4. 单兵工具箱
5. 安洵云情报分析决策平台
6. TG远程侦控平台
7. 网络溯源取证系统
8. 安卓远控系统
9. Linux远控系统
10. 自动化渗透测试平台
11. Mac远控系统
合计11款。
translation:
In total, 11 systems were put into service last year, through three and one institutions:
1. Anonymous anti-tracing wall
2. Network traffic countermeasure system
3. TT control evidence collection platform
4. Individual soldier toolbox
5. Anxunyun intelligence analysis decision-making platform
6. TG remote surveillance platform
7. Network source tracing evidence system
8. Android remote control system
9. Linux remote control system
10. Automated penetration testing platform
11. Mac remote control system

message: 竟然没培训平台这些啊
translation: There is actually no training platform for these.
I thought there would be some.

message:
没有，实战平台列装比较麻烦，如果需要列可能要研发，技术都配合过去。
当时列装因为时间比较紧，就把公司我们部门能够进行演示操作的产品都报了，所以大部分实验室所需要的产品就列了。
translation: No, it is quite troublesome to equip the actual combat platform, and if there is a need for new equipment, it may require research and development, with technical support in place. At the time, due to the tight schedule for equipment installation, all the products that our department could demonstrate and operate were submitted by the company, so most of the products needed by the laboratories were included.
Awkward
I can only list more after this

message: 嗯，今年可以列。因为大部分产品都列了。
translation: Well, this year can be listed. Because most products have been listed.
Are you available on Monday?
I'm here, Captain.

message: 现在公司对技术支撑这块要调整，就是你愿不愿意带个人，直接全部支撑大客户部，你的工资 奖金这些都有大客户部包了，销售部那边的事情都不要你负责。渗透团队也按照这个模式。然后技术团队有保底的奖金。不够的，做得差也，销售自己不要拿提成。
translation: The company is adjusting the technical support area now. Whether you are willing to lead a team or not, you will directly support the large clients department. Your salary and bonuses will be covered by the large clients department, and you will not be responsible for anything in the sales department. The penetration team will also follow this model. The technical team will have a guaranteed bonus. If not enough, even if the performance is poor, the sales team will not receive any commission.

message: 那我们售前团队会拆分成两个部门？类似技术一组二组？
translation: So will our pre-sales team be split into two departments? Like a technical group one and group two?

message: 其实只是人对口哪个销售
translation: Actually it is just a person speaking more effectively with one another for sales.

message: 不负责其他销售的事情；捆绑在一起
translation: Not responsible for other sales; bundled together

message:
还是算了，C总。

我觉得王哲这个人有问题，他挑拨了很多事情，可能是我感觉有误，或者眼光狭隘。

虽然名义上不对接销售的事情，但是我们部门输出的文档，技术方案，招投标，验收，我都会做把控和审核的，我不想跟这种人沾上关系，也不想我自己做的东西被他们拿去用。
translation:
Forget it, Mr. C.

I think Wang Zhe has issues, he stirs up a lot of things. Maybe it's just my misunderstanding or narrow-mindedness.

Even though we are not directly responsible for sales, I will still control and review the documents, technical solutions, bidding, and acceptance produced by our department. I don't want to have any relationship with such people, nor do I want my work to be used by them.

message: 这种肯定就都不管了，你只负责我这边的
translation: This kind of thing is definitely out of control, you only need to take care of my side.

message: 把关这些，让对口技术负责
translation: Closely monitor these and hold accountable for the corresponding technical expertise.

message: 就是你带个人，跟着我们做
translation: Just bring someone with you and follow us.

message:
还是不了，C总。
我真的受不了王哲这种挑拨离间的人。虽然只是支撑你这边，但是在公司看着都碍眼睛。
他的人两年前就在底下吐槽公司产品不行，服务不行，结果呢，赚的比谁都多。也没为公司做多大贡献。

而且就算这样，公司敢不敢把四川安全，甘肃安全，新疆安全这些老客户不算他头上。由吴总自己跟，或者不算他业绩。
translation:
No need, Mr. C. I really can't stand people like Wang Zhe who sow discord. Even though I am only supporting you, it is annoying to see him in the company. Two years ago, he was badmouthing the company's products and services, but ended up making more money than anyone else, without making much contribution to the company.

And even so, does the company dare not to count those old clients in Sichuan, Gansu, and Xinjiang as his achievements? Let Mr. Wu handle it himself, or don't count it towards his performance.

message: 四川倒是吴总的，甘肃和新疆是销售自己做的
translation: Sichuan belongs to General Wu, while Gansu and Xinjiang are selling what they make themselves.

message: 吐槽产品不行，那也是研发的事情，和售前又没关系
translation: Critiquing the product not being good is also a matter of research and development, it has nothing to do with sales.

message:
就算是他们做的，能拿项目还是靠技术兄弟们做起来的。而且两三年了，不知道客户到底是认销售还是认公司能力。

客户如果说只认销售那就是该他们应得的，如果是认公司，那我觉得可能提成给技术还好一些。

而且安全或者公安这些客户不可能就是纯商务关系做项目吧，他王哲或者其他销售也没看到靠纯商务关系给公司带来项目和资源吧。

果子都给销售吃了，后台的兄弟们辛苦了两三年还没他们一年多。

而且王哲背地里搞小动作不是一次两次了，想分化我我们部门，做事跳过伟哥或者我，直接找下面兄弟替客户部署平台或者啥的，他这么玩，有没有其他心思或者啥谁知道呢。
translation:
Even if they do it, the projects still rely on the technical brothers to get it done. And after two or three years, it's not clear whether the clients recognize the sales or the company's capability.

If the clients only recognize sales, then it's what they deserve, but if they recognize the company, then I think it's better to give the technicians a higher commission.

Moreover, clients in the security or public security industry cannot just have purely business relationships for projects. Wang Zhe or other salespeople haven't seen that purely business relationships bring projects and resources to the company.

Salespeople have been enjoying the fruits, while the back-end brothers have been working hard for two or three years, not even reaching what they have achieved in a year.

Furthermore, Wang Zhe has been making moves behind the scenes repeatedly, trying to divide our department by bypassing Wei Ge or me and directly approaching the lower-ranking brothers to deploy platforms for clients. He plays like this, who knows if he has any ulterior motives or intentions.
Sorry, Mr. C.
I recently have been really negative.
There are a lot of complaints.

message: 这些不都是要走流程的么？
translation: Aren't all of these supposed to go through the process?
Can't walk alone

message: 他有时候根本就不走流程，想着私下单独给客户弄了就行
translation: Sometimes he doesn't follow the process at all, thinking that he can just do it privately for the client.

message: 还好我们部门兄弟都有原则
translation: Luckily, the brothers in our department all have principles.

message: 去年9月份列装的时候，他单独打电话给向和兵
translation: When he was commissioned in September last year, he called Xiang and Bing alone.

message: 让向和兵给客户部署安卓M
translation: Let Xiang and Bing deploy Android M for the customers.
Xiang and Bing did not agree.

message: 如果大家后面都没原则了，按他这样玩
translation: If everyone has no principles behind them, play like him

message: 比如他们直接找研发部署个啥平台的这种事，有没有，谁知道呢。他可以找售前，肯定也可以直接找研发。
translation: For example, whether they directly approach the R&D department to deploy a platform, who knows. They can contact the pre-sales team and definitely approach the R&D department directly as well.

message: 这种就要部门负责人管控好
translation: The department head needs to manage this.
Are you going up or down?
Here it comes
I am feeling happy today.
In
In the room, Mr. C

message: 白渝你招进来了的？觉得咋样
translation: Did you invite Bai Yu in? What do you think of him?

message: 我觉得挺不错的一小伙。哈哈，各方面能力啥的，包括做事的态度啊，这些
translation: I think he's a pretty good young man. Haha, his abilities in all aspects, including his attitude towards work, are impressive.
Really?
Truth
Hmm

message: 解决方案部要拆分掉了
translation: The solution department is going to be split up.
Why, C?
Don't you know?
I heard they have disbanded.
But I don't know the specific reason.

message: 也没啥，就是更好的支持前端销售，将售前和销售绑定
translation: Nothing much, just better supporting front-end sales, combining pre-sales and sales.
One on one

message: 梁成辉去了王哲那 ，好像王哲也要了白瑜，白瑜不想去销售那边
translation: Liang Chenghui went to Wang Zhe's place, it seems that Wang Zhe also asked for Bai Yu. Bai Yu does not want to go to the sales department.

message: 我是不想我们部门的任何兄弟去王哲那边
translation: I don't want any brothers from our department to go to Wang Zhe.

message: 不过有些人去也挡不住
translation: But some people go anyway and cannot be stopped.
It is said that she promised to be a pre-sales manager.

message: 哈哈，他当主管也没啥用啊
translation: Haha, it's not really useful for him to be a supervisor.
The department is gone?

message: 不是，我意思他过去那边当主管
translation: No, I mean he used to be the supervisor over there.
There is no use.
Yes.

message: 一是没有价值，二他的能力我也了解，三无外乎是吃老本
translation: One is of no value, two his abilities I also understand, three is nothing but living off past accomplishments.

message: 你昨天朋友圈说的不会是他吧？
translation: Is what you said in your friend circle yesterday about him?

Kuishi refers to the Big Dipper, from "Huainan Zi Astronomical Instructions": "The Dipper is the small year." The seven stars represent the current team of 7 members, as well as the seven continents of the earth. The seven stars carry individual and team dreams, guided by the spirit of craftsmanship, aiming for the great cause of strengthening the country.
